title: Longest Iterable Object Identification
description: In this challenge, you will write a function that takes any number of iterable objects or objects with a length property and returns the longest one.

meta.title: Python Programming | Longest Item Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to write a Python function that finds the longest item in a set of iterable objects or objects with a length property.
meta.keywords: Python, programming, function, longest item, iterable, length

verify.name: Verify Longest Item Python Script Execution
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
